name: Metzger (et al., Appellant), v. George Washington Memorial Park, Inc.
name_abbreviation: Metzger v. George Washington Memorial Park, Inc.

judges: Before Steen, C. J., Steaene, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and AbNOLD, JJ.
parties: Metzger (et al., Appellant), v. George Washington Memorial Park, Inc.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Knight, contained in his adjudication as chancellor and confirmed by the court en banc, reported in full at 70 Montgomery County Law Reporter, page 230 et seq.
Decree affirmed at appellant’s costs.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Benjamin Ludlow, with Mm Duffy, MoTighe & McElhone, for appellant.
II. James Sautter, with him Harold, W. Spencer, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Metzger (et al., Appellant), v. George Washington Memorial Park, Inc.
Argued November 19, 1954.
Before Steen, C. J., Steaene, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and AbNOLD, JJ.
January 3, 1955:
Benjamin Ludlow, with Mm Duffy, MoTighe & McElhone, for appellant.
II. James Sautter, with him Harold, W. Spencer, for appellee.
